name: RecyclingDay
0:
”Alexa, ask recycle day to tell me if it is recycle day.”
”Alexa, open recycle day.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: recycle day
des: This is a simple skill that checks to see if today is recycling day. It assumes recycling day is every other Wednesday, using 5/29/2024 as a reference point for a valid recycling day. It returns Yes if today minus the date 5/29/2024 is divisible by 14 days.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
